00069 #include <msp430x16x.h>
00070 #include <stdio.h>
00071 #include <stdlib.h>
00072 #include <signal.h>
00073 #include "ueaclib.h"
00074 #include "ueac.h"
00075 #include "external_flash.h"
00076 #include "interpreter.h"
00077 #include "filter.h"
00078 #include "conversion.h"
00079 #include "global.h"
00080 #include "timer.h"
00081 #include "calibrate.h"
00082 
00083 void print_grid_v();
00084 void print_grid_i();
00085 int get_command(char *command_buf);
00086 extern short dac_translation[];
00087 
00088 int main(void) {
00089   int i;
00090   init_sys();                        // setup the MSP430 peripherals
00091   printf(BACK_WHITE);
00092   printf(CLR);
00093   printf("UEAC POST\n\r");
00094   flash_integrity_test();
00095   scan_leds();
00096   init_global_variables();
00097   for (i=0;i<25;i++) {
00098     write_lla(i,0);
00099     write_led(i,0);
00100     write_current(i,0);
00101   }
00102   delay_1_25mS(800);     
00103   printf(CLR);
00104   printf("uEACos V2.2 base_002.9\n\r");
00105   led_screen_enable=1;
00106   while(1) {
00107     printf("ueac> ");
00108     get_command(command);
00109     interpreter(command,&ueac_state);
00110   }
00111 }
00112 
00113 void scan_probes() {
00114   int i,j;
00115   for (i=0;i<25;i++) {
00116     write_lla(i,1);
00117     printf("%d ",i);
00118     for (j=200;j>=0;j-=50) {
00119       write_current(i,j);
00120       delay_1_25mS(400);     
00121       convert_a2d(I_CONVERSION,pin_data[i].filtered_result,&conversion_result,i);
00122       printf("%d ",conversion_result.integer);
00123     }
00124     printf("\n\r");
00125     write_lla(i,0);
00126   }
00127 }
00128 
00129 int get_command(char *command_buf) {
00130   char ch;
00131   int counter=0;
00132   while(((ch=getchar())!='\n')&&(ch!='\r')&&(counter++<100)) {
00133     *command_buf++=ch;
00134   }
00135   *command_buf++='\n';
00136   *command_buf=0;
00137   return (counter);
00138 }     
00139 
00140 void print_grid_v() {
00141   int i,j;
00142   for (i=0;i<5;i++) {
00143     for (j=0;j<5;j++) {
00144       convert_a2d(V_CONVERSION,pin_data[i*5+j].filtered_result,&conversion_result,i*5+j); 
00145       printf("%d.%d ",conversion_result.integer,conversion_result.hundredth);
00146     }
00147     printf("\n\r");
00148   }
00149 }
00150 
00151 void print_grid_i() {
00152   int i,j;
00153   for (i=0;i<5;i++) {
00154     for (j=0;j<5;j++) {
00155       write_lla(i*5+j,1);
00156       write_current(i*5+j,200);
00157       delay_1_25mS(500);
00158       convert_a2d(I_CONVERSION,pin_data[i*5+j].filtered_result,&conversion_result,i*5+j); 
00159       printf("%d ",conversion_result.integer);
00160       write_lla(i*5+j,0);
00161     }
00162     printf("\n\r");
00163   }
00164 }
